title: CodeFest 2026 registrations have been EXTENDED!!!
description: On popular demand, we have extended the registration deadline to February 3rd, 2026. Hurry up and register now to secure your spot!

title: CodeFest bootcamp: STARTING NOW!!!
description: The included CodeFest bootcamp for all new coders that have signed up for codefest will begin soon! All PPTs used will be in the resources section.

title: THEMES ARE OUT!!!!
description: The themes have been released! Navigate to the themes page in the navbar to begin planning your projects now! GO! GO! GO!

title: REGISTRATIONS ARE OPEN!!!
description: Registrations are out! Check the link in the navbar to register for Bangalore's biggest overnight school hackathon!
